title: Fact: You only need 5,000 liquid savings to be among the 50% richest people in the world.
body:
The average american (pleb) lives on a paycheck to paycheck, buying things with credit cards he cannot afford or simply with too many loans for again, things he cannot afford. 

My tip to all of you:
Instead of getting a 30,000$ car with an average monthly payment of 450.00$ /mo 
Get a 20,000$ with an average monthly payment of 320$/mo

Don't fall for that trap of "showing off in nice things"
When I was younger I used to think "Wow, a person in a BMW... that person must have a lot of money."
But now, I know that most likely they're in huge debt. (Even if they have a higher salary)
